author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37665
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37795

#### PR description:

Title says it all, needed for a possible backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37860 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37836 to be used for operations.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37665  and #37795
title: [12.3.X] Add support of `TH1I` and `TH2I` in DQM
